Author: GirlWearingMyDress
Text: My mom made a similar comment to me 15 years ago and I remember it vividly. I was in the beginning stages of relapsing at that point and I remember feeling like my mental health was a joke and like she didn’t care at all.    But it was just her stupid attempt at gallows humor, and I’m sure your bf meant the same thing. Your mental health is serious and your health and happiness are important.    Is there a therapist or doctor you can reach out to today?

Author: throwaway4206911711
Text: I'm sorry that's really tough :(. Please be gentle with yourself If you can manage to. Maybe tell him you dont like joking about puke? If you're not ready to disclose your ed to him you could just say you have mild emetophobia.
